posts.post_content:
I have decided to start compiling a complete t206 back set for my collection. Because of the way they present, I would prefer they are SGC graded, but it's not a deal breaker. For the sake of cost, I am probably looking at lower grades (1-2). Below is the list of what I still need in no particular order. Any help is appreciated!

Old Mill
Ty Cobb
Broad Leaf
Lenox
Drum
Uzit
Hindu
Carolina Brights
American Beauty
Cycle
Tolstoi
EPDG
[STRIKE]Piedmont[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Sovereign[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Sweet Caporal[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Polar Bear[/STRIKE]
